author: Harsh Wardhan
comment: After months of searching the perfect one, I came across this beauty, and guess what? I am absolutely satisfied. Design is sporty as well as elegant, no-frills and functional. I just have a few suggestions which would make this even more awesome! I would like to share if you guys could tell me where should I email them! :)
title: My Favorite Watch Face!!

author: Mike S
comment: Love the look, simplicity and the battery widget. Classic but simple, nice *****

author: Chris Fong
comment: Does not work with my moto360 v1

author: Michael McKelvie
comment: Nice clean face, with very little impact on battery life.

author: Bao Viet vu
comment: Not working on samsung gear fit?

author: Moonseok Kim
comment: I like your watch face. But I found a few issues on using it. First, the watch face sometimes remains in active one even in ambient mode. The screen brightness is getting reduced, but the watch face itself remains in normal one. It changes to the ambient watch face after a minute or so. If it is intended, it would be fine. But I guess it isn't intended. Second, the minute needle comes above the hour needle. I think it is more practical to put the hour needle on top of minute needle because it is shorter and doesn't cause any issue on reading both hour and minute. Currently, if two needles are overlapped, the hour needle doesn't show up and it is sometimes confusing.

reply.author: SmartWatchStudio
reply.content:
Thanks for detailed feedback. 
1. Usually backlight timeout depends on the device settings. We've never got similar issue on our devices and would very appreciate if you tell us your watch model. Anyway we'll do additional tests. 
2. It is classic approach. We'll try to find a solution to get an hour hand visible when overlapped with a minute hand.

title: A few cosmetic issues

author: Joydeep Datta Gupta
comment: Excellent.  But some tweaking options are needed. Such as change of colors of clock hand and background.

author: Jenda Mudron
comment: Nice watch face but the ambient mode is very disappointing and spoiled it for me. I have uninstalled it for that reason.
title: Nice watch face

author: Team USA
comment: It wouldn't show up on my watch. Just a blank watch

reply.author: SmartWatchStudio
reply.content: Thank you for your report. Fix just released

title: After update
